title: Popcorn Time App Beta 0.2.7 Win
description:
[center]#Popcorn time 

## Idea

To allow any computer user to watch movies easily streaming from torrents, without any particular knowledge.

[img]http://static.cdnjd.com/imgs/how-ui.png[/img]

### Status

Under development (RC1) for Mac OSX - Windows - Linux.

### APIs

**Currently used:**
-movie torrents API.
-for subtitles
- [TheMovieDB](http://www.themoviedb.org/) for movies metadata.
[i]Enjoy![/i]
[IMG]http://i979.photobucket.com/albums/ae273/DethHolly/the_zps6c224a2e.png[/IMG]
[/center]
